name: PickUp Truck Dog Fight
description:
Are you looking for action and destruction then Strap in and boost your energy to destroy all your opponents and prove you are the most destructive.
You have the best PickUp Truck and nothing can stop you now!

* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent enough to give You a tough competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Real Animations And Physics
